It's typically cooked by simmering meat and bones in broth, creating a rich and aromatic base.	<>	Pho is a Vietnamese soup featuring thinly sliced beef, rice noodles, and fresh herbs in a flavorful broth, cooked slowly over heat, served in a bowl garnished with sliced onions and cilantro, showcasing a rich, aromatic, and savory presentation.	<>	Pho is a Vietnamese noodle soup made by simmering beef bones and rice noodles in broth, garnished with fresh herbs like cilantro and scallions, served with sliced beef, onions, and sometimes meatballs, typically featuring a clear, flavorful broth with a light foam on top and vibrant green herbs for garnish.	<>	Pho is a Vietnamese noodle soup with a clear broth, garnished with sliced onions, herbs, and thinly sliced meat, typically cooked by simmering rice noodles and meat bones in a flavorful broth.

It is traditionally cooked by simmering bones, spices, and aromatics until richly aromatic and then served hot in a clear, slightly orange broth.
/food-101/images/pho/3625863.jpg			Pho is a Vietnamese soup typically made with broth, rice noodles, thinly sliced beef or chicken, and garnished with fresh herbs like cilantro and green onions, cooked by simmering ingredients for hours to achieve a rich, aromatic flavor.	<>	Pho is a Vietnamese noodle soup made with clear broth, rice noodles, tender beef or chicken, and fresh herbs like scallions and mint. It's simmered for hours to develop flavor, served piping hot, and often garnished with lime, chili, and bean sprouts.	<>	Pho, a traditional Vietnamese soup, is made by simmering beef or chicken bones in a flavorful broth with rice noodles, scallions, and herbs, resulting in a clear, aromatic, and richly colored soup with a smooth texture and savory-sweet taste.	<>	Pho is a Vietnamese soup typically made with beef, rice noodles, and aromatic herbs, simmered in a flavorful broth until tender. It is visually characterized by its clear broth, meat slices, and vibrant green herbs floating on top, creating a rich and comforting dish.	<>	Pho is a Vietnamese noodle soup typically made by simmering beef bones and rice noodles in a flavorful broth, garnished with fresh herbs like cilantro and scallions, offering a comforting, aromatic experience.
